case.name: Christodoulou v Disney Enterprises Inc [2006] FCA 38 (3 February 2006)

citances.sentence:
2. The appellant pay the respondents' costs of the motion dated 23 November 2005. '
His Honour delivered written reasons for his decision: Christodoulou v Disney Enterprises Inc [2006] FCA 38.

2 Mr Christodoulou appealed. On Disney's application, Merkel J made an order for security for costs in the amount of $10,000: Christodoulou v Disney Enterprises Inc [2006] FCA 38. Mr Christodoulou duly paid that amount into court.
